title: Reading Zen and the Art of Motorcycle Maintenance - Chapter 20, Part 1
description:
#zen_and_the_art_of_motorcycle_maintenance #Robert_Pirsig

The Mountain is a metaphor for various elements of the journey, both physical and psychological.
